attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to make a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
We are leaving the EU because of borders! The majority of UK voters believe immigration is out of control. The strain that puts on public services, local communities and British values being affected. 

Mr Trump won on a stop immigration ticket. So agree with it or not, he is beginning to deliver on campaign promises that he believes will help protect the American people. If the Chinese leader and Martin McGuiness can meet the Queen why would we seek to deny the leader of our oldest friends?
attributes.background:
Donald Trump has democratically been elected as President of the United States, our oldest and most important ally. 

He must be allowed to enter the UK as head of the US Government and SHOULD be invited to make an official State Visit. Let’s hear what he has to say to the UK, while in the UK!
